attributes.action: Make It A Legal Requirement That You Have To Carry ID On You At All Times
attributes.additional_details:
We want to make it A legal requirement that you have to carry ID on you at all times as this would solve so many problems that could cost the country more money e.g. a stop and search by a police officer and he asks for ID and you don't have any so he has to waste more time investigating who you are.

and many more situations.
